title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Boil pasta, cook beef, mix with sauce.

title: Pancakes
instructions: Mix ingredients and cook on a griddle.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Cook chicken, mix with lettuce, dressing, croutons, and cheese.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Chop vegetables, stir-fry with sauce and seasonings.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter bread, place cheese between slices, grill until golden brown.

title: Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs, add ingredients, cook in a pan.

title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef, assemble with toppings in taco shells.

title: Margarita Pizza
instructions: Spread sauce on dough, add cheese and basil, bake until crispy.

title: Roasted Veggie Bowl
instructions: Roast vegetables and chickpeas, serve in a bowl.
